column5: Just got word that Wine Lake Camp was sold and new owners will be running the camp this year. Sheds a little light on the plan to pay up in March. New owner Nick is very excited to be taking over. We are in the first group to come in, so it will be interesting to see what changes. We will figure it out in about 130 days....not that anyone is counting. Hooks

I doubt many changes the first week. I wouldn't be surprised if Herb helps him open up the camp for the first time. When I go in June he might start to make some changes but who knows. It is not worth worrying about, it is still WLC.
True true Scott. It would be hard to top the job Herb and Ann do, but I will give Nick a chance! But you are right, it is an awesome fishery.
